message.name: A42
message.say: and I can help!

message.name: A43
message.say: let's see if we can help Jordan fill out his application today! Please help Jordan with some of his questions. I will be here along the way to help.

message.name: A44
message.say: Experience, education, and contact information is the best answer. Personal information such as religious affiliation should not be given. And credit history is often not a requirement by employers.

message.name: A45
message.say: Please select an answer.

message.name: A46
message.say: Dishonesty could result in not being hired. You should always provide correct and up to date information. Any mistakes could cost you the job.

message.name: A47
message.say: Please select an answer choice.

message.name: A48
message.say: Server is a good choice based on Jordan's information. However, he could always apply for any open position.

message.name: A49
message.say: Please select an answer.

message.name: A50
message.say: Communication skills would be the best answer. Communication is the sharing of information. What better way to share that by talking. However, a positive attitude might help too!

message.name: A51
message.say: That's not quite what I was looking for. A better answer could be something like communication skills.

message.name: A52
message.say: The best answer would be communication skills or even just having a positive attitude.

message.name: A56
message.say: Remember, we are look for the kind of job Jordan would like to get. Type the best answer below.

message.name: A59
message.say: Let's get started on a few things Jordan had trouble with on his application. Here's the next question. Has Jordan ever been employed by Eastside Grill restaurants before? Jordan has selected the box for no. Let's refer to Jordan's resume to double check his answers for this section. Please click the button at the bottom for yes or no to respond.

message.name: A60
message.say: The correct answer is yes. We can find this information on Jordan's resume. He has worked for this company before in a different city. Always double check your selections because remember dishonesty can result in not getting the job.

message.name: A61
message.say: Please select an answer.

message.name: A62
message.say: Jordan has marked that he did not graduate from high school? According to his resume, is this information correct? Please select yes or no at the bottom to submit your answer.

message.name: A63
message.say: Jordan did graduate from high school. The correct answer is yes. Again, it is important to make sure that you click the correct buttons when filling out a resume or you run the risk of not being hired.

message.name: A64
message.say: Please select an answer.

message.name: A65
message.say: Click the task that is the most related to the open serving position.

message.name: A66
message.say: Seated and obtained orders is the best answer. Because seating and taking orders is experience that can be used in many different settings. Every restaurant may not be the same and some of the tasks listed may not apply to serving anywhere rather than just on place.

message.name: A67
message.say: Please select an answer.

message.name: A68
message.say: Chelsea Jones is a good answer!

message.name: A69
message.say: Not quite what I was looking for. Though

message.name: A70
message.say: Well, we now know that Jordan has worked for Eastside Grill before. He may want to use his former manager from the restaurant as a reference. She may be able to offer information to his potential new employer that could be helpful for getting the job.

message.name: A71
message.say: Please select an answer.

message.name: A72
message.say: Chelsea Jones is a good answer because she is a former manager of Jordan's. She also works for the same brand of restaurants as Jordan is applying for.
